meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Ebbe David Muir Barry Rubinowitz Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2165.

td.p: John Ebbe, a teacher from Dove Canyon, California
David Muir, a computer cunsultant from Los Angeles, California
Barry Rubinowitz, a writer from West Hollywood, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,200)

tr.td: MODERN HISTORY
SONGS OF THE '60s
NEWSPAPERS
AROUND THE WORLD
FLUIDS
ODDS & ENDS
